title: Using the blockchain to verify email addresses sounds pretty smart
detailed_content: Blockchain is a logical, easy-to-use solution for verifying the identity of an email address. Which is why I like the idea of using Proton Mail’s Key Transparency email service: it uses the blockchain to hold your public keys, preventing email accounts from being breached.Proton Mail is based on end-to-end encryption, ensuring that only the intended…
